name: Matryoshka Memory
description:
Experience the addictive short-term memory game that's as tight as Tetris! Grow from the tiniest Russian nesting doll to the largest by memorizing patterns of colours you see for only three seconds.

Created by H.H. Magoo in Delphi using RADstudio. Music is 'Russian Winter' by Derek & Brandon Fiechter, used with permission.
